doc.name: ModifyDate
doc.description: Modify date by adding or subtracting a value to one of the date fields.
doc.author: Patricia Derler
doc.port: Input for value in a given unit to be added or subtracted from date token received by input.
Output for the new date token.
doc.property: Parameter for operation. The operation is a choice of the string values "+" and "-" and defaults to "+".
Unit of value to be added or subtracted. This can be either part of the date, i.e. year, month, day, ... and it defaults to second.
